indic_aug.preprocess package¶

Submodules¶

indic_aug.preprocess.preprocess module¶

class indic_aug.preprocess.preprocess.Preprocess(src_input_path, tgt_input_path)[source]¶

Bases: object

Preprocessing raw input.

preprocess(src_output_path, tgt_output_path, batch_size, funcs='all')[source]¶

Performs preprocessing of input corpus.

Parameters

  • src_output_path (str) – Path to preprocessed source corpus.

  • tgt_output_path (str) – Path to preprocessed target corpus.

  • batch_size (int) – Number of documents to be brought into memory at a time.

  • funcs (str, list) – Preprocessing functions to apply to raw corpus (refer globals.py for allowed functions).

indic_aug.preprocess.preprocess.normalize_sent(sent, lang)[source]¶

Returns normalized form of sentence.

Parameters

  • sent (str.) – Sentence to be tokenized.

  • lang – Language code (refer globals.py) of sentence.

Returns

Normalized sentence.

Return type

str

indic_aug.preprocess.preprocess.pretokenize_sent(sent, lang)[source]¶

Returns tokenized form of a sentence.

Parameters

  • sent (str) – Sentence to be tokenized.

  • lang (str) – Language code (refer globals.py) of sentence.

Returns

Tokenized sentence.

Return type

str

indic_aug.preprocess.vocab module¶

indic_aug.preprocess.vocab.build_vocab(src_input_path, tgt_input_path, src_vocab_size, tgt_vocab_size, output_dirpath)[source]¶

Generates vocabulary from preprocessed corpus. Use preprocess.Preprocess to preprocess raw corpus. Outputs *.model and *.vocab files compatible with sentencepiece.

Parameters

  • src_input_path (str) – Path to preprocessed source corpus.

  • tgt_input_path – Path to preprocessed source corpus.

  • src_vocab_size (int) – Max number of tokens in source vocabulary. Pass -1 to use all tokens.

  • tgt_vocab_size (int) – Max number of tokens in target vocabulary. Pass -1 to use all tokens.

  • output_dirpath (str) – Path to directory where to write *.model and *.vocab files.

indic_aug.preprocess.vocab.read_vocab(vocab_path)[source]¶

Reads tokens in vocabulary into a list.

Parameters

vocab_path (str) – Path to the *.vocab file to read.

indic_aug.preprocess.vocab.score2freq(model, words)[source]¶

Converts negative log likelihood score returned by sentencepiece to frequency of occurrence of tokens in corpus.

Parameters

  • model (sentencepiece.SentencePieceProcessor) – sentencepiece.SentencePieceProcessor object on which load method has been called with a *.model file.

  • words (list) – List of words whose frequencies are to be returned.

Returns

Dictionary of word to frequency pairs.

Return type

dict

indic_aug.preprocess.vocab.score2freq_vocab(model_path, vocab_path)[source]¶

Returns frequencies of all words in the vocabulary, given a *.vocab file.

Parameters

  • model_path (str) – Path to *.model file compatible with sentencepiece.

  • vocab_path (str) – Path to *.vocab file compatible with sentencepiece, corresponding to model at model_path.

Returns

Dictionary of word to frequency pairs.

Return type

dict
